name: Which Witch (Brametjuhh, Dwightojo, ChriticalHit, Zupami)
description:
Which Witch is a multiplayer party game deisgned for 4 players. The goals is to collects roots to finish as many magical potion recipes before your time run out. But beware, some of you may not be who they seem, and secret motives are hidden below the surface!

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/which-witch-2

Credits:

Made using Coherence and part of their GGJ 2023 contest.

"Magic Escape Room" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/  

Spreadable Fruit:

Brametjuhh, Chriticalhit, Dwightojo, Zupami
